shadow.name: OBSCURITY
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Peace, expressing through obscurity

gift.name: IDEALISM
gift.description: The gift frequency of Peace, expressing through idealism

siddhi.name: LIGHT
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Peace, expressing through light

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 11 shadow frequency. The obscurity you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural idealism. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from obscurity to idealism.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your ajna. Notice the sensation of obscurity.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 11 consciously for 7 days, the obscurity pattern will shift toward idealism.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 11 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from obscurity toward idealism
